messages.content: ComfyUI-Tripo is an extension that integrates Tripo into ComfyUI, allowing users to generate 3D models from text prompts or images directly within the ComfyUI interface.
What are the features of ComfyUI-Tripo?
ComfyUI-Tripo allows users to generate 3D models from text prompts or images using the Tripo API, and view the generated models directly in ComfyUI using the TripoGLB Viewer node.

ComfyUI-Tripo can be installed from source by cloning or downloading the repository into the 'ComfyUI/custom_nodes/' directory and installing the required dependencies. It can also be installed using ComfyUI-Manager or comfy-cli.
How do you set your Tripo API key for ComfyUI-Tripo?
You can set your Tripo API key for ComfyUI-Tripo by setting it as an environment variable named 'TRIPO_API_KEY', or by setting it in the node input field or in 'config.json'.
What is the typical time taken to generate a draft model using ComfyUI-Tripo?
It usually takes 10-15 seconds to generate a draft model using ComfyUI-Tripo.
What workflows are available in ComfyUI-Tripo?
ComfyUI-Tripo provides workflows such as Text to Mesh, Image to Mesh, Refine a draft Mesh, and Animation to generate and refine 3D models.
Where are the generated models downloaded in ComfyUI-Tripo?
In ComfyUI-Tripo, the generated models are automatically downloaded in the 'ComfyUI/output' folder after generation.
Under what license is ComfyUI-Tripo released?
ComfyUI-Tripo is released under the MIT License.
